Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2008 07:09AM healthteach wrote: Hi Jodian72-I was allergic to Taxol...It was my second treament of it that I had the reaction.   It was not as bad as yours but scary how they attack you.  I got the chest pains and red in the face.  They tried again after pre medicating with tons of benedryl and steroids and it happened again.  They switched me to taxitere and I was fine it is just that I had to take the every three weeks instead of two and I wanted to be done, and it gives you a little more bone pain.  I have never been allergic to ANYTHING in my life, lucky us!!!  Your baby is beautiful.. babies make everything happy!  Mine are 9 and twins are 6!
Posts.Title: Allergy to Taxol Jodian72 LinTol
